cfc:SLinBattle.NAME: Mark of Defector
DESCRIPTION: You cannot #ySave&Load during combat after %b%d #ySave&Load. NL (You have #ySave&Load #b%d times)

cfc:SLoutBattle.NAME: Mark of Defaulter
DESCRIPTION: You cannot #ySave&Load out of combat after %b%d #ySave&Load. NL (You have #ySave&Load #b%d times)
